content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for expressing interest in my apartment in New York. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent and I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Let's start by discussing the size of the apartment. The apartment is 25 square meters in size.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro, thank you.
Can you tell me more about the apartment and its location?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Ryanah. The apartment is located in the heart of New York City, in a bustling and vibrant neighborhood. It is close to many popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping centers. The apartment is fully furnished, with modern amenities such as high-speed internet, central air conditioning, and a well-equipped kitchen. It also has a balcony overlooking the city skyline, which provides beautiful views of the city.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro, thank you.
Can you tell me more about the terms of the lease?
Please provide me with the lease agreement so I can review it before signing.
Thank you.
Can you tell me more about the building and its amenities?
Please provide me with the building's plan and schedule of maintenance.
Thank you.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Of course, Ryanah. The lease agreement will be provided to you once you have agreed to the rental price. It will outline the terms and conditions of the lease, including the length of the lease, the rental price, and any additional fees or charges. It will also include information about the security deposit, move-in and move-out dates, and any other important details.

Regarding the building and its amenities, the building is a modern and well-maintained structure with a 24-hour concierge service, a fitness center, a rooftop terrace with stunning views of the city, and a laundry facility on-site. The building also has a schedule of regular maintenance, which includes routine inspections and repairs to ensure that the building is always in good condition.
name: Heinrich Heine
